objects.text: Easy Controls • Family-Sized Capacity • Smart Features for Every Home

product_details.name: Insignia Premium Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Efficiency Meets Style
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Easy-to-Use Controls
• Sleek White Design with Modern Black Accents
• Large Capacity Drum for Family-Sized Loads
• Multiple Wash and Dry Cycle Options
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Advanced Digital Control Panel with Timer
• Compact Design Perfect for Modern Homes
• Front-Loading Configuration for Easy Access
• Adjustable Temperature Settings
• Ventilated Dryer System for Efficient Drying
• Durable Construction with Stability Feet
• Smart Features with Custom Program Options
• Contemporary Design with Premium Finish
• Space-Saving Stackable Design Option

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and clean layout with a cool-toned aesthetic, tailored for promoting home appliances. It is composed of layered vector elements with a soft gradient background transitioning from a light sky blue to a gentle aqua hue. Decorative semi-transparent circular and rectangular shapes add subtle interest across the banner.

At the top, the banner displays a bold headline (`heading`) emphasizing the brand in uppercase, followed by a stylish subheading (`subheading`) that highlights modern design and efficiency. Centered below the text, two front-loading washing machines (`product_image`) are showcased with clarity. Underneath is a concise feature list (`description`), and the price is prominently displayed (`price`) in large, bold type. A call-to-action section consists of a colored rectangular button (`cta_background`) with inviting text (`cta`) in white.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #005c97 (Headline, CTA background, accent shapes)
- Charcoal Gray: #333333 (Subheading, description)
- White: #FFFFFF (CTA text, product background)
- Light Sky Blue Gradient: #e8f4fc to #c5e5fc (Background gradient)
- Purple-Blue Accent: #363795 (Visual accents)
product_color: The product image features a minimalistic and modern color palette dominated by clean **white (#FFFFFF)** which conveys purity and efficiency. The control panels and knobs integrate **black (#000000)** and **charcoal gray (#2C2C2C)** to create a high-contrast visual that highlights the interface functionality. Accents of cool **blue (#3DA9FC)** are used on labels and indicators, introducing a touch of vibrance and tech-savvy appeal. Brushed **silver (#C0C0C0)** around the knobs adds a metallic sophistication. These colors blend harmoniously, ensuring clarity while each element stands out. Ideal banner design should use this palette to reflect the product's sleek, clean, and contemporary aesthetic.
